ygData.subject: RE: Need advice for a trade
ygData.msgSnippet: I d suggest trading it to an enchanter for some really good jewelry.  Last I heard they were going for around 800+pp so you would be able to get some really
ygData.messageBody:
I'd suggest trading it to an enchanter for some really good jewelry. Last I
heard they were going for around 800+pp so you would be able to get some
really good stuff in trade I would imagine. Perhaps there are some bards
out there who can set you up with a good enchanter on Nameless.

Kitasi of E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Brian Young [mailto:byoung@...]
Sent: Tuesday, January 04, 2000 11:19 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Need advice for a trade


From: Brian Young <byoung@...>

I am a level 19(well almost) bard on Nameless. I am wearing just
about full bronze. I have a dragoon dirk and a PGT. I have one
jagged band, thick leather apron and BS mantle. one derv ring and two
onxy earrings.

I was fighting in Runnyeye and a high level druid killed Borxx and
sold me the Lens for only 30pp!! So, now I have a Staff of the
Observers. I would like to trade this for something good like a nice
weapon, but I am not sure how much it worth or really how much any
better weapons might be worth. And advise?

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
